author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver: I anticipated. I did not really finish with U till 6 yesterday evening. The final proofreading alone took me five hours. I do not know what to think of it. Hundreds of river names are woven into the text. I think it moves. I hope you will like it and will write me about it as I am considerably wound up. I have a budget of news but will wait for a day or so until the singsong fades out of my addled head.
